mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: Hay Day - Crafting the Diamond Ring

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: To craft the Diamond Ring, the player needs to level up to 40

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label:
The receipe for Diamond Ring is :

- 2 Golden Bars

- 2 Platinum Bars

- 1 Diamond

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: In order to craft a Golden Bar, the player needs to place the Golden Ore in Smelter and wait 12 hours to be crafted.

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: In order to craft a Platinum Bar, the player needs to place the Platinum Ore in Smelter and wait 16 hours to be crafted

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: It takes 8 hours for Smelter to be build

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: It takes 1 day and 12 hours (36 hours) for Jeweler to be build

mxTextCell.title: Text
mxTextCell.label: After producing all items needed to craft a Diamond Ring, it needs to put all items in Jeweler
